entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 08:30 AM NDT Saturday 28 May 2016
Temperature: 5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: 1.9°C
Wind: S 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 28 May 2016
